description:
The Dice you can play anytime anywhere.
Throw 3D animated dices as real. 
Basic Features:
- Instant summ up
- Hear the dice roll
- Up to 20 six-sided pipped dice with rounded corners
- Look around the table with tilt, keeping it horisontal
- Shows previous summ on screen
- History of last 50 throws
- Cusom coloring
- Autosave presets on exit
- Adjustable accelerometer sensitivity for rolling
- Realtime physics
